info.title: Reacher
info.description:
### What is Reacher?

Reacher is a powerful, free and open-source email verification API service. It is provided both as a SaaS and as a self-host solution.

post.description: Perform a full verification of an email address.

requestBody.description: Input containing all parameters necessary for an email verification.

CheckEmailOutput.title: CheckEmailOutput
CheckEmailOutput.description: The verification result of an email.

misc.description: Miscellaneous information about the email account.

mx.description: Information gathered from querying the MX records of the mail server.

smtp.description: Verifications performed by connecting to the mail server via SMTP.

Error.title: Error
Error.description: Object describing an error happening during the misc, MX, or SMTP verifications.

message.description: A human-readable description of the error.

MiscDetails.title: MiscDetails
MiscDetails.description: Miscellaneous information about the email account.

is_disposable.description: Is the address provided by a known disposable email address provider?

is_role_account.description: Is this email a role-based account?

gravatar_url.description: URL to the email's Gravatar profile picture. It is only populated if check_gravatar is set to true in the request, and if the email has an associated Gravatar.

MxDetails.title: MxDetails

records.description: The list of FQDN (Fully Qualified Domain Names) of the mail server.

MxDetails.description: Object holding the MX details of the mail server.

SmtpDetails.title: SmtpDetails
SmtpDetails.description: Verifications performed by connecting to the mail server via SMTP.

can_connect_smtp.description: Can the mail exchanger of the email address domain be contacted successfully?

has_full_inbox.description: Is the inbox of this mailbox full?

is_catch_all.description: Is this email address a catch-all address?

is_deliverable.description: Is an email sent to this address deliverable?

is_disabled.description: Has this email address been disabled by the email provider?

SyntaxDetails.title: SyntaxDetails
SyntaxDetails.description: Syntax validation of an email address.

domain.description: The domain name of the email, i.e. the part after the "@" symbol.

username.description: The username of the email, i.e. the part before the "@" symbol.

Reachable.title: Reachable
Reachable.description: An enum to describe how confident we are that the recipient address is real: `safe`, `risky`, `invalid` and `unknown`. Check our FAQ to know the meanings of the 4 possibilities: https://help.reacher.email/email-attributes-inside-json.

CheckEmailInput.title: CheckEmailInput
CheckEmailInput.description: Input containing all parameters necessary for an email verification, as well as some config on how to perform the verification.

from_email.description: In the SMTP connection, the FROM email address.

hello_name.description: In the SMTP connection, the EHLO hostname.

smtp_port.description: SMTP port to use for email validation. Generally, ports 25, 465, 587 and 2525 are used.

yahoo_use_api.description: For Yahoo email addresses, use Yahoo's API instead of connecting directly to their SMTP servers.

gmail_use_api.description: For Gmail email addresses, use Gmail's API instead of connecting directly to their SMTP servers.

microsoft365_use_api.description: For Microsoft 365 email addresses, use OneDrive's API instead of connecting directly to their SMTP servers.

check_gravatar.description: Whether to check if a gravatar image is existing for the given email.

hotmail_use_headless.description: For Hotmail/Outlook email addresses, use a headless navigator connecting to the password recovery page instead of the SMTP server. This assumes you have a WebDriver compatible process running, then pass its endpoint, usually http://localhost:4444. We recommend running chromedriver (and not geckodriver) as it allows parallel requests.

retries.description: Number of retries of SMTP connections to do.

smtp_security.description: How to apply TLS to a SMTP client connection.

username.description: Username to pass to proxy authentication.

password.description: Password to pass to proxy authentication.

Duration.title: Duration
Duration.description: An object representing a duration (seconds + nanoseconds).

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description: A Reacher API key is required for all requests. Sign up on https://reacher.email to get your personal API key.
